definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: Transposons are one cause of genetic diseases such as haemophilia .
sentences.chinese: 轉位子是產生如血友病一類遺傳病的一個致病因子。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the infectivity of the Vibrio parahaernolyticus isolated from the brine.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究從海水中分離出的副溶血弧菌的致病性。

sentences.english: Conclusion Gram positive organisms are major pathogens of bacteremia in critically ill patients.
sentences.chinese: 結論革蘭陽性球菌是危重病患者菌血症的重要致病菌。

sentences.english: The types that cause disease are rare, Sadowski says.
sentences.chinese: 薩道斯基說，大腸桿菌會致病的種類很少。

sentences.english: More than 50 people across US and Canada got sick after eating the melons .
sentences.chinese: 在美國和加拿大，已有50多人因食用香瓜而致病。

sentences.english: The virus EV71 is a common cause of HFMD.
sentences.chinese: 現時腸病毒71型是引起手足口病的主要致病原。

sentences.english: Error catastrophe theory has led to a strategy of mutagenesis to control disease viruses.
sentences.chinese: 錯誤突變理論引導了通過突變來控制致病病毒的策略。

sentences.english: The bacteria could be consistently cultured for at least 14 days without losing its virulence.
sentences.chinese: 青枯菌在連續培養14天后接種致病力不減。

sentences.english: May divide into the tubercular and the non-tubercular two kinds according to the infection pathogenic bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 按照感染的致病菌可以分爲結核性和非結核性兩種。

sentences.english: The pathogenicity of hypha and spore was weakened.
sentences.chinese: 菌絲和分生孢子致病性減弱。

sentences.english: Infection with a novel coronavirus has been implicated as the cause of SARS.
sentences.chinese: 一種新的冠狀病毒已被確定爲本病的致病因子。

sentences.english: But many Americans now think of the virus as mild.
sentences.chinese: 但許多美國人現在認爲這種病毒致病性不強。

sentences.english: There were difference in resistance by inoculation with different strains of Aspergillus flavus.
sentences.chinese: 不同致病菌株接種，抗性反應有差異。

sentences.english: The highly pathogenic form is far more dramatic.
sentences.chinese: 高致病形式表現得更爲明顯。

sentences.english: The cause of end stage renal disease is multifactorial.
sentences.chinese: 出生日時體重過低被推論是末期腎病致病原因之一。

sentences.english: Conclusion The predominant pathogenic fungi of onychomycosis was dermatophytes.
sentences.chinese: 結論甲真菌病的致病菌仍以皮膚癬菌爲主。
